short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Timer and Stopwatch for work and leisure

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stopwatch TimeMaster is an app designed to help you efficiently manage your time between study, lectures, and rest. It tracks how much time you spend on different activities and helps you create a balanced daily schedule. With features like detailed analytics, customizable sounds, and always-on-top mode, TimeMaster gives you full control and flexibility over your time management.

Key Features:

Track Lectures and Study Sessions: A user-friendly calendar for planning and tracking the time you spend on studying, lectures, and homework. All data is displayed in real-time and can be easily edited.

Rest Mode: Set reminders for breaks and rest periods to maintain productivity and avoid burnout. Stopwatch TimeMaster supports customizable timers for work sessions, rest periods, and study blocks.

Time Analytics: Detailed reports and statistics on how much time you dedicate to study, lectures, rest, and personal activities. Track your habits and trends to optimize your time management.

Always-On-Top Display: Stopwatch TimeMaster stays visible over other apps and websites, so you never lose track of time while working or studying. You’ll always know how much time has passed without having to switch back and forth between windows.

Customizable Sounds and Time Intervals: Choose notification sounds according to your preferences and set personalized time intervals for work, study, and rest periods. You’ll be alerted at the right moment to keep you on track without unnecessary distractions.

Local Data Storage: All your data is stored locally on your device, ensuring maximum privacy and security. No data is uploaded to the cloud or third-party servers, so you maintain full control over your information.

Flexibility and Ease of Use: The simple, intuitive interface makes it easy to get started and set up the app the way you want. All controls are just a few taps away, so you can quickly tailor it to your personal needs.

Benefits:

Always in View: The app stays on top of other windows, so you can always see how much time you’ve spent without switching between apps.
Detailed Analytics: Review your productivity with comprehensive reports and optimize your daily schedule.
Personalized Settings: Customize timers, notification sounds, and time intervals to fit your needs.
Privacy and Security: Your data is stored locally, with no cloud storage or third-party access, ensuring full privacy and control over your information.
Who Is This App For?
Stopwatch TimeMaster is perfect for students, freelancers, and anyone looking to manage their time more effectively between study, work, and personal activities. If you want to track your time and improve productivity without stress, Stopwatch TimeMaster is your ideal tool.

With Stopwatch TimeMaster, you can optimize your day, maintain balance, and achieve better results — all while staying stress-free!
